thread.title: Vice President Biden to make statement at White House
thread.title_full: Vice President Biden to make statement at White House - US News

author: USNews
title: Vice President Biden to make statement at White House
text:
Amid speculation about Democratic presidential race, White House announces Biden statement Associated Press Oct. 21, 2015 | 12:12 p.m. EDT + More WASHINGTON (AP) â€” The White House says Vice President Joe Biden will be making a statement shortly at the White House.
Such solo statements from the vice president are rare. But Biden's statement comes amid feverish speculation about whether he will enter the Democratic presidential race in a challenge to the front-runner, former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton.
President Barack Obama planned to join Biden for the statement.
